类的使用
general.Classifier

  • 使用Classifier的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    classifyFurnishing  

    • classifyFurnishing中Classifier的使用

      classifyFurnishing中Classifier的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BedClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的
      A Classifier dealing with six categories of beds:
      single-bed, hammock, double-bed, baby-bed(cot), bunk-bed, round-bed
      分类6类床：单人床、吊床、双人床、宝宝床（有栏杆的）、双层床和圆床的分类器 0|||baby-bed 1|||bunk-bed 2|||double-bed 3|||hammock 4|||round-bed 5|||single-bed
      class  FurnishingClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的
      classifies only three categories, wall-paper, wooden-floor, floor-tile
      分类3类贴图：墙纸、墙砖、地板 0|||floor-tile 1|||wall-paper 2|||wooden-floor
      class  HardwareClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的
      classifies 8 categories of hardware:
      carpet,wall-cloth,leather,wood,wall-paper, paint, brick, tile
      分类8类硬装贴图：墙纸、墙布、皮革、木头、地毯、墙砖、地砖、涂料 0|||b-carpet 1|||b-wall-cloth 2|||l-leather 3|||m-wood 4|||p-wall-paper 5|||t-paint 6|||z-brick 7|||z-tile
      class  StyleClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的
      classifies 4 categories of furnishing styles:
      western-luxurious, western-simple, Chinese, Japanese
      分类4类装修风格：西式奢华、西式简约、中式和日式 0|||western-sim 1|||western-lux 2|||japanese 3|||chinese
